content.question: In order to heighten the impact of his work, Tuffery

choices.label: sold miniature copies of the sculpture at international art exhibits
featured versions of the sculpture in interactive public street performances
documented the creation of the sculpture in a series of published photographs
created an immersive experience by featuring the sculpture in a video installation

content.answer: featured versions of the sculpture in interactive public street performances

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
